title: Digital Microlearning Program for Improving Nursing ESP Speaking Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Clinical nursing practice experience and basic English communication skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning speaking program for practicing nurses, providing real-time feedback through expert verification systems

learning_goals: Learners can engage in nursing scenario-based English conversation with over 80% accuracy
Learners can proactively perform speaking practice at least three times per week using self-regulated learning strategies
Clinical communication competence is evaluated through project presentations incorporating expert feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
